attributes.action: call a GENARAL ELECTION with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
call a general election with immediate effect.
this site is a joke, it doesn't allow petitions which express political and public conflicting interests.
we need a general election now! before 
gordon brown bankrupts this country!!!!!!!
